text:
Company: Sideways 6 Development (<https://www.sideways6.com/>)
Position: Data Engineer
Location: Minsk, Belarus (must already have the right to work in Belarus, relocate)
:fork: : from $18k to $48k net annual depending on the seniority (+long-term loyalty options)

Since 2014, Sideways 6 is an Innovation Management SaaS helping large organisations collect & analyse millions of employees' ideas connected from different channels. Those ideas aim to improve business and proactively involve employees into the innovation process. Our product is used by iconic global companies such as Nestle, Mars, BAT, British Airways, Centrica, Virgin Trains, Page Group, and supported by London and Minsk teams.

We secure years ahead platform's development by updated technologies: Microsoft Azure Stack, .NET Core, ReactJS, MS SQL, MongoDB, and others. There are 35 colleagues on the board now.

Being data-driven in all decisions, we want an exceptional Data Engineer to build our analytics capabilities by actionable, live dashboards.

Key responsibilities:
- Build a data warehouse/lake for sideways 6 integrating multiple sources including SQL Server, MongoDB, Google Analytics.
- Build a configurable dashboard based on predefined requirements using a data visualization tool e.g. power BI or other cost effective alternatives.
- Train internal staff on how to support and maintain the data warehouse and data visualisation tool in the future.
- Full lifecycle implementation from requirements analysis, platform selection, technical architecture design, application design and development, testing, and deployment for data management and analytics solutions.

Requirements:
- Experience in Data Warehouse/lake Design & Implementation (Microsoft Azure Stack, e.g. Azure Data Factory (or Azure Bricks), Azure Data Lake Gen 2, SQL Server).
- Experience with programming, databases and relevant tools (e.g. SQL, Python, Google Analytics, Power BI/Tableau).
- Nice to have machine learning frameworks experience: Python Eco Systems (scikit-learn, TensorFlow).
- Nice to have experience with big-data tools e.g. Hadoop (Spark, Map-Reduce).
- Additional back-end .Net Core experience would be a plus for a further career planning.
- At least 1 year of practical experience across systems integration, business intelligence, analytics, data management and solution architecture.
- Participation in end-to-end implementation of a Data Warehouse/lake and building an analytics dashboard on it.
- Have a strong understanding of data governance principles.
- Be comfortable dealing with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
- Fluent spoken English (from B2 up).

Main required stack: Microsoft Azure Stack, e.g. Azure Data Factory, Azure Data Lake Gen 2, SQL Server; SQL, Python, Google Analytics, Power BI.

What’s on Offer:
- An awesome, open and vibrant product start-up environment.
- Flexible working hours.
- Generous educational budget to use at your discretion.
- Medical insurance.
- English practice every day and regular English courses.
- Competitive salary linked to the US currency and career progression plan.
- Regular social company gatherings and annual summer party in the sun.
- Business trips to the UK and Europe.
- Comfortable workplace with equipped mini-kitchen, snack-bar, and table tennis in the centre of Minsk.

More about the product and company at <https://www.sideways6.com/>
Apply here: <https://sideways-6.breezy.hr/p/91884c56380b01-data-engineer>
Ask questions here: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/alenasheveleva/>

attachments.title: Sideways 6 | Idea & Innovation Management Software
attachments.text: Sideways 6 is integrated idea & innovation management software that helps you capture, manage and implement ideas from your employees. Trusted by some of the world’s leading companies, including British Airways, Diageo and Centrica, Sideways 6 has enabled over 3 million employees to have their ideas heard.

attachments.title: Data Engineer at Sideways 6
attachments.text: Sideways 6 exists to build better businesses through employee ideas. We believe that great ideas can come from anywhere and that giving employees a voice is the secret to business success. Over 4 million employees from the likes of Virgin, AstraZeneca, Sainsbury’s, Nestle and International Airline

text: Велосипед не мой, знакомые попросили запостить, по всем вопросам обращайтесь пожалуйста к HR этой компании: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/alenasheveleva/>

Всем привет Ищутся два Senior Data Engineers в Нидерланды (две вакансии)
Компания: крупный банк и крупная авиакомпания
*Вилка:*
 5000-7000 Euro Gross в месяц по результатам собеседования. Ищутся специалисты в быстрорастущее направление по исследованию данных.
*С Вас:*
 -Релевантный опыт Apache Spark
 -5+ лет опыта Java или Scala
 -5+ лет в роли Data Engineer
 -Свободный английский
*С нас:*
 -Релокация
 -Комфортный офис
 -Условия обсуждаются с успешным кандидатом
Расширяется команда аналитики данных: сейчас команда состоит из двух Senior Data Engineers, задач много, и они подбирают себе ещё двух коллег.
Свои CV присылайте на почту: <mailto:zucharo@bluehatconsultancy.com|zucharo@bluehatconsultancy.com>
